subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Jim Calhoun, back after a medical leave of absence of three and a half weeks, said his team gave “one of the worst performances I’ve had here” in a loss to Cincinnati.
snippet: Jim Calhoun, back after a medical leave of absence of three and a half weeks, said his team gave “one of the worst performances I’ve had here” in a loss to Cincinnati.
